The Ring Falcon

By Liam McCarthy (age 5) & Seth Hall


Liam is the Ring Falcon.

the Ring Falcon is a battle spy.

He is so smart, he knows when there is a battle.

He discovers that the bad guys are planning a battle.

He writes it down and gives it to the king.

Seth is the king Eagle Gold.

The king wraps it up and sends it to the bad guys to tell them they should surrender. That makes the bad guys think they're going to win.

The Ring Falcon has planned a sneak battle to destroy the bad guys.

The Ring Falcon and the King defeat the bad guys.

The Ring Falcon gets more powers and two falcons and throwing falcon rings.
